dc_title_s: Map of the routes in India: with tables of distances between the pricipal military towns & military stations, showing also the
dc_description_s: Scale approximately 1:5,000,000 ; (E 62°00ʹ00ʺ--E 98°00ʹ00ʺ/N 40°00ʹ00ʺ--N 5°00ʹ00ʺ). Relief shown by hachures. Shows railways and telegraph cables. "Engraved by the Omnigraph, F. P. Becker & Co." Includes distance tables: Distances in the Madras Presidency -- Distances in the Bombay Presidency -- Distances in Bengal & Agra. 65 x 77 cm
